page.title: 16ACTIVITIES
page.content: years and over) 1 night a week. A permanent Youth Leader, 3 adult helpers. Activities include outings, barbeques, art, craft, discos, etc. {THURLSTONE BAND}_ had been in existence for 131 years. It had 33 senior and 20 junior members from Penistone and Stocksbridge, Millhouse and Thurlstone. The band practises at Mill Lane, Thurlstone on Monday and Wednesday nights. The conductor is Mr Eric Crossley, who has been playing the soprano cornet for 32 years and conductng for 20 years. The band performs at functions all over South Yorkshire and compete in contests, playing both modern and classical music. {CRIME}_ shows an increase on burglaries and thefts from cars, (following the national trend). The community policeman said most of these crimes are committed by people from
